system.description:
When you closely examine a situation or a location, roll +Sense.

Anyone can answer, but the Overlord has the final say.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value:
You find one of those answers the hard way.

You may only ask one question.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
You find one of those answers the hard way.

Ask three questions from the list.

system.choices:
• What is going on here? What do my senses tell me?
  • Is something hidden or out of place? If so, what looks suspicious?
  • Tell me about       . How could it hurt me? How could it help me?
  • Tell me about       . What are they doing? What will they do next?
  • What will happen if I       ?
